name: Rbot (SpartG)
description:
Take part of you! A small robot which has lost its components. As the levels progress, it will find its components and solve puzzles in order to access the levels to come. (for example, he will find an arm that will allow him to press buttons, etc.)


Team : Cidota

tkattan : Lead Developer, Integrator, Sound

Seyte : Developer, Integrator

Ectario : Developer, Music, Integrator

SpartG : Animations, Graphics and 3D models

Game made during Global Gam Jam 2021.

https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/rbot-0

Note :

To quit the game tap Alt+F4
If you see "Congratulation you finished the game" after the first level, is not a bug because we did not have time to complete the rest of the level
